item.title: 中国钢铁需求量已降至全球总量的一半以下
item.description: 据世界钢铁协会称，由于中国房地产行业的衰退抑制了对金属的需求，2024 年中国的钢材消费量将在六年内首次低于全球钢材消费量的一半。【原文：China will account for less than half of global steel consumption in 2024 for the first time in six years, according to the World Steel Association, as the decline in the country’s real estate sector pummels demand for the metal.】

item.title: 亚洲对冲基金在 9 月份的反弹中表现优于全球同行
item.description: 上个月中国股市的大涨帮助亚洲对冲基金在前三个季度的表现领先于全球同行，而此前三年的表现一直处于落后状态。【原文：A surge in Chinese stocks last month helped Asia hedge funds pull ahead of global peers for the first three quarters, after three years of trailing performance.】

item.title: 马来西亚 2025 年支出计划有望引起外国兴趣
item.description: 随着政府继续推进财政改革，马来西亚创纪录的支出计划必将进一步推动外国投资者对其资产的兴趣，尽管这对股市的直接影响不大。【原文：Malaysia’s record spending plan is set to drive further foreign interest in its assets as the government continues to build on its fiscal reforms, even if the immediate impact on equities is muted.】

item.title: 火锅与马力的混合。中国汽车的噱头是否太过分了？
item.description: 众所周知，中国的电动汽车制造商总是不断推陈出新，以各种新功能吸引买家。车载卡拉 OK、方向盘变身游戏机、座椅可倾斜成舒适的平躺床。【原文：China’s electric vehicle makers have been known to push the envelope when it comes to dreaming up new functions to attract buyers. There’s in-car karaoke, steering wheels that turn into gaming consoles and seats that recline into comfy lie-flat beds.】

item.title: 中国银行降低贷款利率以刺激疲软的经济
item.description: 作为一系列旨在恢复经济增长和阻止房地产市场崩溃的措施的一部分，中国央行在 9 月底降低利率后，又下调了基准贷款利率。【原文：China cut its benchmark lending rates after the central bank lowered interest rates at the end of September as part of a series of measures aimed at reviving economic growth and halting a housing market crash.】

item.title: 越南总理预计 2025 年经济增长率为 6.5% 至 7
item.description: 越南政府网站上的一篇文章称，越南总理范明正预计 2025 年越南经济将增长 6.5%至 7%，并表示政府将推动经济增长 7%至 7.5%。【原文：Vietnam Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh projects the nation’s economy will grow 6.5% to 7% in 2025 and says the government will push for expansion of 7%-7.5%, according to a post on the government’s website.】

item.title: 24 亿美元流入 ETF，比特币濒临 7 万美元
item.description: 比特币周一走高，原因是大量资金流入这种最大数字资产的交易所交易基金，以及对美国监管前景的乐观情绪提振了市场情绪。【原文：Bitcoin pushed higher on Monday as a spurt of inflows into exchange-traded funds for the largest digital asset as well as optimism about the outlook for US regulations lifted sentiment.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数将向 6,000 点里程碑迈进：调查
item.description: 据彭博市场实时脉搏最新调查显示，今年美股的狂热涨势有望延续到2024年的最后阶段，即使美国总统大选迫在眉睫。【原文：This year’s furious rally in US stocks is poised to extend into the final stretch of 2024, even as the US presidential election looms as a major wild card, according to the latest Bloomberg Markets Live Pulse survey.】

item.title: 交易商评估中东风险和需求担忧，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 中东局势持续紧张，以色列总理本雅明-内塔尼亚胡上周末与高级助手举行了一系列会议，讨论下一步攻击伊朗的问题。【原文：Oil steadied — after slumping by almost 8% last week — on sustained tensions in the Middle East, with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu holding a series of meetings with top aides over the weekend to discuss the next attack on Iran.】

item.title: 矿产资源公司称正就税务问题对创始人进行调查
item.description:
澳大利亚矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）正在调查与创始人兼董事总经理克里斯-埃里森（Chris Ellison）有关的付款，尽管董事会表示对他及其领导能力充满信心。【原文：

Australia’s Mineral Resources Ltd. is probing payments linked to founder and Managing Director Chris Ellison, even as the board said it has full confidence in him and his leadership.

】

item.title: 预算紧张抑制了英国秋季房屋要价的正常上涨
item.description: 据房产网站 Rightmove 报道，在英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）本月首次发布预算案之前，购房者的 "恐慌情绪 "抑制了房价在秋季的典型反弹。【原文：Buyer “jitters” ahead of Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ first budget this month are muting a typical autumn bounce in house prices, according to property website Rightmove.】

item.title: 中国交易员打赌：即使特朗普获胜，中国人民银行也会继续持有人民币
item.description: 中国国内的人民币交易商似乎比境外交易商更有信心，认为人民币的动荡将在美国总统大选期间得到控制。【原文：China’s domestic yuan traders appear to be more confident than their offshore counterparts that the currency’s turbulence will be contained around the US presidential election period.】

item.title: 投资者抢筹股票，中国非银行流动性趋紧
item.description: 本月，中国非银行金融机构的流动性状况有所收紧，因为交易员们纷纷赎回现金，以搭乘本地股上涨的顺风车。【原文：Liquidity conditions at China’s non-bank financial institutions have tightened this month as traders redeemed cash to ride the upswing in local shares.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，台湾释放核电开放信号
item.description: 台湾地区总理赵政泰表示，台湾 "非常愿意 "使用新的核技术来满足芯片制造商在人工智能热潮中对电力的需求。【原文：Taiwan is “very open” to using new nuclear technology to meet surging demand from chipmakers devouring electricity in the AI boom, according to Premier Cho Jung-tai — one of the strongest signs yet that the government is rethinking its opposition to reactors.】

item.title: 中东和美国大选推动避险需求，黄金升至创纪录水平
item.description: 黄金创下历史新高，避险需求继续支撑着金价，因为交易商们关注着中东紧张局势的升级和美国大选选情的日益紧张。【原文：Gold reached a record high, with safe haven demand continuing to support prices as traders monitored escalating tensions in the Middle East and an increasingly tight US election race.】

item.title: 华尔街连胜后亚洲股市将上涨：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街上周以新高收盘后，大多数亚洲股市准备在周一早盘上涨。【原文：Most Asian stocks are poised to rise in early trading Monday after Wall Street finished last week on fresh highs.】

item.title: 马来西亚部长准备应对燃料补贴改革引起的反弹
item.description: 马来西亚政府承诺在 2025 年年中取消汽油补贴，正在为公众的反弹做好准备。这一承诺具有政治敏感性，而且拖延已久，是说服投资者相信政府认真进行财政改革的关键。【原文：Malaysia’s government is bracing for public backlash as it commits to rolling back petrol subsidies mid-2025, a politically-sensitive and long-delayed pledge that’s key to convincing investors that it is serious about fiscal reform.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 对未来石油消费的预测不断减少，给原油价格带来了更大的压力。今年大西洋飓风季节的风暴数量少于 2023 年，但五次登陆美国的飓风造成的损失将成为近期最具破坏性的飓风。橙汁期货在高位徘徊。【原文：Diminishing forecasts for future oil consumption are adding pressure to crude prices. This year’s Atlantic hurricane season has spun out fewer storms than 2023, but the toll from five that made landfall in the US will go down as some of the most destructive in recent memory. Orange juice futures are lingering at elevated levels.】

item.title: 莫桑比克警方在宝石公司红宝石矿遭袭时向两人开枪
item.description: 首席执行官肖恩-吉尔伯森（Sean Gilbertson）说，周日约有 300 人闯入莫桑比克东北部 Gemfields 集团有限公司拥有的蒙特普韦斯红宝石矿的一个矿坑。他说，有两人被警察开枪打死。【原文：About 300 people invaded a pit at the Montepuez ruby mine owned by Gemfields Group Ltd. in northeastern Mozambique on Sunday, Chief Executive Officer Sean Gilbertson said. Two people were shot by police, he said.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，Perplexity AI 在新一轮融资中寻求 80 亿美元估值
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周日报道，人工智能搜索公司Perplexity AI已开始筹款谈判，其目标是将估值提高一倍以上，达到80亿美元或更高。【原文：Artificial intelligence search company Perplexity AI has started fundraising talks in which it aims to more than double its valuation to $8 billion or more, the Wall Street Journal reported Sunday.】

item.title: 以色列对真主党经济据点发动攻击
item.description: 以色列针对真主党在黎巴嫩的经济据点发起了一次军事行动，特别是针对这个由伊朗支持的激进组织及其领导人使用的一家金融机构。【原文：Israel launched a military operation targeting Hezbollah economic strongholds in Lebanon, in particular a financial institution used by the Iran-backed militant group and its leadership.】

item.title: 普京称俄罗斯与阿联酋的贸易额在过去三年中增长了两倍
item.description: 俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）周一在莫斯科接待阿联酋统治者谢赫-穆罕默德-本-扎耶德-阿勒纳哈扬（Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan）举行正式会谈前表示，俄罗斯与阿联酋之间的贸易在过去三年中增长了两倍。【原文：Trade between Russia and the United Arab Emirates tripled over the last three years, said President Vladimir Putin as he hosted UAE ruler Sheikh Mohammed Bin Zayed Al Nahyan in Moscow ahead of official talks on Monday.】

item.title: 罢工的波音工人让首席执行官的收益日变得悬而未决
item.description: 凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）作为波音公司首席执行官的财报首秀增加了一个悬念，因为工人们将在同一天投票决定是否接受这家飞机制造商的最新提案，并结束长达五周的罢工。【原文：Kelly Ortberg’s earnings debut as Boeing Co. chief executive officer has gained an element of suspense as workers vote on the same day whether to accept the planemaker’s latest proposal and end a five-week-long strike.】

item.title: CD&R公司与政府签约后接近赛诺菲OTC交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在美国收购公司与法国政府签署社会承诺之后，Clayton Dubilier & Rice 公司收购赛诺菲消费者健康部门控制权的交易即将达成。【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is nearing a deal to acquire control of Sanofi’s consumer health unit after the American buyout firm signed social commitments with the French government, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 世界经济断层线从价格转向政治和债务
item.description: 随着通胀放缓为不太可能出现的软着陆扫清了道路，全球经济正带着意想不到的 "顺风 "驶向年底。但是，尽管经济形势一片大好，政治障碍却摆在面前。【原文：The global economy is heading toward year end with unexpected tailwinds as slowing inflation clears a path for an unlikely soft landing. But while the economics side of the equation is looking up, political hurdles lie ahead.】

item.title: 西南航空在重大政策调整后寻求与埃利奥特停战
item.description: 经过四个多月与激进投资者埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）的公开斗争，低成本航空先驱西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：After more than four months of waging a public battle with activist investor Elliott Investment Management, low-cost pioneer Southwest Airlines Co. may finally be headed toward a truce.】

item.title: 苏丹准备在关键管道修复后出口南方石油
item.description: 饱受战争蹂躏的苏丹表示，它已准备好恢复从内陆国南苏丹出口石油，这标志着中断了八个月的输油管道已经修复。【原文：War-torn Sudan said it’s ready to resume exporting oil from landlocked South Sudan, signaling a pipeline that’d been out of service for eight months has been repaired.】

item.title: 印尼新内阁再次任命财政部长因德拉瓦蒂
item.description: 印度尼西亚总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）周日再次任命斯里-穆利亚尼-因德拉瓦蒂（Sri Mulyani Indrawati）为国家财政部长，这标志着东南亚最大经济体的政策连续性。【原文：Indonesia’s President Prabowo Subianto reappointed Sri Mulyani Indrawati as the nation’s finance minister on Sunday, in a sign of policy continuity in Southeast Asia’s largest economy.】

item.title: 苹果新款迷你 iPad 彰显公司秘密的人工智能优势
item.description: 苹果公司的新款 iPad mini 彰显了公司在人工智能领域的秘密优势。还有Sonos在经历了低迷的起步后重启耳机；亚马逊推出彩色Kindle；Jony Ive设计的夹克上市。在管理方面，苹果公司的首席人事官和顶级招聘官离职，公司任命了新的硬件领导人。【原文：Apple’s new iPad mini highlights the company’s secret advantage in artificial intelligence. Also: Sonos weighs a headphone reboot after a sluggish start; Amazon rolls out a color Kindle; and Jony Ive-designed jackets arrive. On the management front, Apple’s chief people officer and top recruiter depart, and the company names new hardware leaders.】

item.title: ASML 显示芯片领域的鸿沟：人工智能赢家与其他人的对比
item.description: 在价值 5300 亿美元的半导体行业中，人工智能浪潮中的公司和非人工智能浪潮中的公司之间的鸿沟越来越大。而从本财报季的早期回报来看，这一鸿沟可能很快就会扩大到深渊。【原文：There’s a growing divide in the $530 billion semiconductor industry between the companies that are riding the artificial intelligence wave and those that aren’t. And looking at the early returns from this earnings season, that gulf could soon widen into an abyss.】
